product_name: Asolo Flame GTX Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: These lightweight, three-season Asolo Flame GTX hiking boots offer support, shock absorption and grip so you can focus on the beautiful scenery and not on your feet. Water-resistant suede leather and high-tenacity nylon uppers deliver durable flexibility and support while remaining breathable. Seam-sealed Gore-Tex(R) liners deliver complete waterproof protection while allowing ample breathability for comfort in wet conditions. Wicking nylon linings absorb and disperse excess moisture for fast drying. Gusseted scree tongues and padded ankle cuffs add protective comfort at ankles; rubber toe bumpers protect against impact and abrasion. Removable EVA footbeds cushion feet and are perforated in the forefoot area for added ventilation. Lightweight EVA midsoles provide cushioning comfort and shock absorption. Asoflex(R) thermoplastic supports provide torsional stability and control while protecting against impact and bruises on rocks and uneven terrain. Visible Active Heel Support incorporates high- and low-density thermoplastic urethane elements to bring you optimal heel control and shock absorption. Durable rubber outsoles on the Flame GTX hiking boots include Aso-brake technology for maximum downhill grip and grip on uneven terrain.
short_description: These lightweight, three-season Asolo Flame GTX hiking boots offer support, shock absorption and grip so you can focus on the beautiful scenery and not on your feet.
